data.eml:eml: Report on some Plesionika Bate, 1888 and first record of Stylopandalus Coutiére, 1905 (Caridea, Pandalidae) from Brazilian waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cardoso, Irene (2009): Report on some Plesionika Bate, 1888 and first record of Stylopandalus Coutiére, 1905 (Caridea, Pandalidae) from Brazilian waters. Zootaxa 2120: 53-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188076
